name: immateriality
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of not having a physical form: immateriality of He is a filmmaker battling against the disembodied immateriality of film. While anxiety cannot be directly represented because of its immateriality, it could be expressed by something such as a facial gesture.
the quality of not being important, or not relating to the subject you are thinking about: This shareholder activity is not being disclosed due to its immateriality.
More examplesFewer examplesThe work highlights the immateriality of information and images. The organization is characterized by immateriality in terms of documents and their storage, as it is not linked to a physical filing system.
